title: Update Patient Allergy List
description: During an intake, a patient reports a new allergy to penicillin. A nurse needs to update the patient's allergy list.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and navigate to the allergies section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse accesses the correct module for managing allergies.
Nurse searches for and selects the correct substance.

tasks.description: Document the nature of the reaction (e.g., 'Hives') and save the changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse adds the specific reaction details, and the new allergy is now prominently displayed in the patient's chart banner.
